UserBean - Class in com.root.bean
This is UserBean class This bean class contains data member, constructor, getter setter methods and toString() method it contain spring validation by using some annotation like:- @Range, @Size, @NotNull etc Bean class mainly interact with the Service Layer
UserBean() - Constructor for class com.root.bean.UserBean

UserDAOImpl - Class in com.root.dao
UserDAOImpl class to perform all the CRUD operations
UserDAOImpl() - Constructor for class com.root.dao.UserDAOImpl
 
UserEntity - Class in com.root.entity
This is UserEntity class This entity class contains data member, getter setter methods it contain annotations, these annotation create the table name(@Table), column name(@column), primarykey(@Id) etc it is mainly used to JPA with the help of entity class user able to insert,update,delete data into database Entity class mainly interact with the Dao layer
UserEntity() - Constructor for class com.root.entity.UserEntity

UserServiceImpl - Class in com.root.service
